title: Fully furnished studio 18m2
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Fully furnished and totally renovated studio in the 11th district near Parmentier metro station.
Total space 18m2.
Two large windows.
Lots of light.
Fully equipped kitchen.
Shower and WC.
4th floor walk-up.
Safe and quiet.
760 euros per month including building charges and water.
Real estate agency fee to be paid on top of the rent (one time fee).
To schedule a visit, please send us an email or contact us on WhatsApp +33663087837
